p: In the authorsâ€™ preliminary experiments with the application of thymol and carvacrol in air-tight containers, phytotoxicity was observed as increased mushiness and dullness of strawberry fruits after 24 hours (unpublished data). However, Bhaskara Reddy et al. [ 6] did not observe any visual phytotoxic symptoms after 4 days of fruit exposure to T. vulgaris essential oils. Further work is needed to identify and minimize the cause of adverse effects on fruit quality by volatiles [ 9].
